description: Detect scenarios where a potentially unauthorized application or user is modifying the system time. Author: @neu5ron. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: HyperV or other virtualization technologies with binary not listed in filter portion of detection
name: Unauthorized System Time Modification
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4616" AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.ProcessName:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\VMware\\VMware\ Tools\\vmtoolsd.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\VBoxService.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.ProcessName:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe" AND winlog.event_data.SubjectUserSid:"S\-1\-5\-19"))))
